inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getBotAssociation.

instanceId.description: Identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instanceId in the ARN of the instance.

lexBot.description: Configuration information of an Amazon Lex (V1) bot. Detailed below.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getBotAssociation.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
